products.description: The Sassy lip gloss that feels as good as it looks. Smokey rose gloss delivers explosive shine, in seven universal shades. One luscious swipe of sassy Gloss  wand gives lips more to love, while conditioning shea butter enriches from within. Wearing this lipgloss makes lips look instantly fuller, with a non-sticky formula that’s super shiny and has an addictive peach-vanilla scent you just can’t get enough of.
products.name: smokey rose
